did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Thurman Pierce papers
did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. Thurman Pierce was an executive with JWT who served in a number of positions relating to market research and media.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: BBA Northwestern; MBA Harvard; JWT Consumer Paner 1953; Supervisor of Media Research 1955; Media buyer 1957; Manager of Print Media 1963; Vice President JWT 1975.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Consists of a chronological file that includes clippings, correspondence, memoranda, newsletters and other publications. Topics represented include market and media research, JWT company history and news, and departmental information. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
